main event: A reddish-orange fireball was observed leaving a white smoke trail before disappearing in the sky near San Angelo, Texas.
interesting points: The fireball was described as the size of a dime held at arm's length., The fireball appeared to burn out before disappearing., The sighting lasted approximately five seconds., Observers reported a brilliant flash before the object turned out., There have been previous reports of unidentified high-speed targets disappearing in the same area.
witness description: No specific witnesses were confirmed in the report.
